item.description:
How about flying Thursday, June 12 to Laconia (KLCI) leaving
about 5:30. There is a great Italian restaurant (Fratellos -
www.fratellos.com) a short distance away.

I lined a courtesy car today which will fit 7 people (we can easily make two trips if we need to). This should be a short easy trip and a lot of
fun.

http://www.airnav.com...
Total nautical miles 62.9
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet in front of the Terminal or drive over to Charley's hangar, building 13.
item.why: These trips have been excellent.... We always have room for guests or other pilots.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fly out to Laconia
